title: Certified Nursing Assistant CNA Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 1 week. I interviewed at MarinHealth Medical Center in Mar 2023
Interview Descriptions: Check in at front and head to unit interviewing for . Sat down in conference room and waited for interviewers. They came in and asked me a few simple questions.
Interview Questions: What is a difficult situation and how did I deal with it?

title: Internship Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. I interviewed at MarinHealth Medical Center
Interview Descriptions: The interview process for low level internships was relatively casual and informal. However, you must still be able to show your interest in the position with justifications rooting from what you hope to get out of the role.
Interview Questions: Where do you see yourself in five years?

title: Dietetic Technician Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at MarinHealth Medical Center
Interview Descriptions: The interviewer asked a few clinical questions, and for your background. For the most part, it was very straight-forward. There were also a few questions on your work ethic. Was conducted 1:1 with the clinical dietary manager
Interview Questions: Name a time when you worked with someone you did not get along with and how did you react?

title: Medical Scribe Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at MarinHealth Medical Center (Greenbrae, CA) in Nov 2019
Interview Descriptions: Interviewer was thorough and transparent in their expectations of the position and tasks required of employee. She elaborated on the doctor on call that the medical scribe would be interacting and helping with and went through the day to day tasks of a medical scribe.
Interview Questions: What EHR systems are you familiar with or have experience in using?

title: Pharmacist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at MarinHealth Medical Center (Greenbrae, CA) in Jan 2019
Interview Descriptions: It was an interview with a panel made up of the the director of pharmacy,  the manager of operations, clinical manager, lead technician,  and pharmacy buyer. They took turns asking questions and taking notes on copies of my resume.
Interview Questions: Why do you want to work for Marin General Hospital?

title: Senior Administraive Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 days. I interviewed at MarinHealth Medical Center (Greenbrae, CA) in Dec 2017
Interview Descriptions: Initial phone call/screening with recruiter answering several questions and preparation for the real interview.  Interview scheduled at the end of that week.  Met with the recruiter prior to interview to go over things once more.  Interview was scheduled for an hour, which we took up the full hour.
Interview Questions: How do you prioritize or stay on top of everything?

title: Administration Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at MarinHealth Medical Center (Greenbrae, CA) in Mar 2017
Interview Descriptions: Interviewed with the supervisor, was asked about my previous work experience;  nothing out of the ordinary, no surprises or sneaky tactics. Position required a health check, drug test and a background check.
Interview Questions: Are you comfortable working in a hospital environment?

title: Per Diem Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at MarinHealth Medical Center (Kentfield, CA) in Nov 2016
Interview Descriptions: Applied for one position, my resume showed up for another position & i was called for an interview. 2-3 months call to hire. HR process seemed too slow but this is also sometimes typical in hospitals
Interview Questions: Pace of work flow & ability to keep up

title: Clerical Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 6 weeks. I interviewed at MarinHealth Medical Center (Greenbrae, CA)
Interview Descriptions: Met with the immediate supervisor but not the department manager.  I was suppose to meet with person X but they had me meet a different person than expected. It wasn't very structured. I interviewed over 10 years ago and those people are no longer there.  I've heard it can take some time between application and hire for some people.
Interview Questions: Describe a safety issue you encountered and how did you handle that ?

title: Radiologic Technologist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at MarinHealth Medical Center (Greenbrae, CA) in Jan 2016
Interview Descriptions: Phone first, then in person panel interview. It was pretty standard, the people I met with were very nice and explained all about the hospital and how things are run. Great people!
Interview Questions: How do you handle stressful situations?

title: Exercise Counselor Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 5 months. I interviewed at MarinHealth Medical Center (Greenbrae, CA) in Oct 2015
Interview Descriptions:
I had to attend three meetings at MGH, and I needed to have all my health records up-dated, including my immunizations. I had to dress a certain way- and do computer work to pass the entrance requirement.
The interview process was long and I was asked to attend meetings that typical MGH employees were required to attend, even though I am an independent contractor.
Interview Questions: If I thought I would be a good fit for the position, and I would fit into the MGH culture.

title: Staff RN Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at MarinHealth Medical Center (Larkspur, CA) in Nov 2013
Interview Descriptions: Interviewed by Human Resources Recruiter for the position. She interviewed me in a face-to-face type situation after having met with the nurse manager. She reviewed the hospital policies and what the procedures were for the next steps in the hiring process. I was then set up for a drug-screen and background check. I was on-boarded within 2 weeks.
Interview Questions: how well do you work in stressful situations

title: Lab Assistant II Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at MarinHealth Medical Center in Feb 2012
Interview Descriptions: Interview was fine but management said "we don't like for you to go to school or have another job
Interview Questions: "Tell me about a time where you had problems  and how did you handle it"

title: Certified Surgical Technologist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at MarinHealth Medical Center (Greenbrae, CA) in Jul 2010
Interview Descriptions: If you intern here and are good the chances of acquiring employment are good!

title: Finance Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at MarinHealth Medical Center (Greenbrae, CA) in Jan 2010
Interview Descriptions: HR is excellent. Jennifer was super sweet and nice.

title: RN Float Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at MarinHealth Medical Center (San Francisco, CA) in Apr 2009
